laboratory_examinations.findings: No evidence of any abnormalities; technician noted the stomach was full.
Demonstrated a free-floating mass that filled the entire stomach, surrounded by a thin rim of contrast material.
Found a trichobezoar, or hairball, measuring 45 cm long and 8 cm in diameter.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Abdominal Ultrasound or Simple Abdominal X-rays after swallowing barium
laboratory_examinations.findings: Biannual follow-up tests to ensure no hair reaccumulation.
